text: James Ronald McDaniels (April 2, 1948 - September 6, 2017) was an American professional basketball player. He was born in Scottsville, Kentucky.Pete Thamel (March 27, 2008) Recalling Forward Thinking at Western Kentucky. New York TimesJim McDaniels Interview . hilltopperhaven.com. McDaniels was drafted by the Seattle SuperSonics in the second round of the 1971 NBA draft and by the Utah Stars in the ABA Draft,Jet magazine, February 1971, Vol. 39, No. 21, p. 50 but he began his professional career with the Carolina Cougars of the American Basketball Association. McDaniels died in Bowling Green, Kentucky on September 6, 2017 from a long-illness at the age of 69. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Seattle SuperSonics players Category:Los Angeles Lakers players Category:Sportspeople from Kentucky
title: Jim McDaniels
